reviewText: Its very misleading first off this movie is the full season one of this great show season 2 never came out until friday 17 2017 so this well not have season 2 on it which was a shame and as for the ova the only language it has on it is Japanese but there are english subtitles i still say its an awesome movie if you really enjoy it but keep in mind your only be paying for season 1 and the 2 ova
This anime is GREAT!! I love it!! Great story line there's drama, comedy, love, and sadness! I highly recommend this dvd!
